label: Unit ID number
description: Unique identification number of the institution in the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System.

label: Share of students earning more than $25,000/year (threshold earnings)
description: Share of students earning over $25,000/year (threshold earnings) XX years after entry

label: Years after entry
description: The number of years after the academic year when the student entered the institution that this variable was measured. For example, if the year variable is 1997 (meaning these data are collected in academic year 1997–98) and the years_after_entry variable is 0, the cohort_year is the 1996-97 academic year and the 1997–98 academic year, pooled.

label: Mean earnings of female students working and not enrolled
description: Mean earnings of female students working and not enrolled XX years after entry

label: Years after entry
description: The number of years after the academic year when the student entered the institution that this variable was measured. For example, if the year variable is 1997 (meaning these data are collected in academic year 1997–98) and the years_after_entry variable is 0, the cohort_year is the 1996-97 academic year and the 1997–98 academic year, pooled.

label: Mean earnings of male students working and not enrolled
description: Mean earnings of male students working and not enrolled XX years after entry

label: Years after entry
description: The number of years after the academic year when the student entered the institution that this variable was measured. For example, if the year variable is 1997 (meaning these data are collected in academic year 1997–98) and the years_after_entry variable is 0, the cohort_year is the 1996-97 academic year and the 1997–98 academic year, pooled.

label: Average tuition and fees for full-time students (dollars)
description: Sum of tuition and fees; prior to 1999 tuition and fees were not separately reported.
